#导入包

```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(reader,
       readxl,
       openxlsx,
       tidyverse,
       dplyr,
       tidyr,
       ggplot2,
       ggthemes,
       ggsci,
       ggprism,
       patchwork
)
```

#读取数据

```{r echo=FALSE}
lm1 <- read.xlsx("~/desktop/AA1.xlsx")
str(lm1) #解构数据集
```

```{r}
   
   ggplot(data = lm1) +
   aes(x = Team, y = HIRD, fill = Location )+
   geom_boxplot() +
   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) +
   labs(title = 'The relationship of Team and HIRD')
```
